revised_title: Refutation of the Assertion That the Female Ornithorhynchus Paradoxus Has Mammary Glands
tldr: Sir Everard Home, along with Mr. Hartshorn and Mr. Bauer, examined three female Ornithorhynchus paradoxus specimens sent by Governor Darling. After a thorough examination, they could not find any mammary glands, despite them being claimed to exist by Professor Meckel.
